name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow
name_original: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow
description:
Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow is an action game developed by 7 Studios. It came out on 28-06-2006. It was published by Bethesda Softworks. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow has a Metascore of 50, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow on PlayStation 2 and PC.
It was scored by Inon Zur.
